messages.title: Vote for the only party working to put our PLANET, our PUBLIC SERVICES and PEOPLE before profits for big corporations
messages.content: BY VOTING GREEN YOU WILL HELP US TO: • REBUILD A FAIRER ECONOMY • PROTECT OUR PUBLIC SERVICES • PROTECT OUR PLANET AND ENVIRONMENT

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recover the vast sums lost to tax evasion and tax loopholes. Save £100 billion by cancelling Trident nuclear weapons. Increase the Minimum Wage to £10 per hour by 2020. Introduce a Wealth Tax on the top 1% & a Robin Hood Transaction Tax. Establish a fair Voting System & devolve more power locally.

Secure a publicly owned NHS, free at point of use. Improve Public Transport & bring Railways into public ownership. Keep Education free for all and scrap university Tuition Fees. Provide Fairer Pensions and free Social Care for older people.

Phase out Fossil Fuel & Nuclear based energy generation. Invest in Renewable Energy and Energy Conservation. Take Climate Change seriously & work for a fair worldwide agreement. Reduce Pollution & improve Health by promoting Cycling & Walking with better public transport and cycling infrastructure.

issues.economy: Recover the vast sums lost to tax evasion and tax loopholes. Save £100 billion by cancelling Trident nuclear weapons. Increase the Minimum Wage to £10 per hour by 2020. Introduce a Wealth Tax on the top 1% & a Robin Hood Transaction Tax. Establish a fair Voting System & devolve more power locally.
issues.education: Keep Education free for all and scrap university Tuition Fees.
issues.environment: Phase out Fossil Fuel & Nuclear based energy generation. Invest in Renewable Energy and Energy Conservation. Take Climate Change seriously & work for a fair worldwide agreement.
issues.governance: Establish a fair Voting System & devolve more power locally. Participatory Democracy, transparency & ethical investment by Councils. Sustainable local business support. A fair Living Wage for all, an end to Zero Hours Contracts. Improved Public Transport, investment in Renewables & associated jobs. Decent Social Housing & Affordable Homes to meet local people's needs. The rights of local farmers against 'the threat of cheap, less regulated US imports' if the Trans-Atlantic Trade & Investment Partnership (TTIP) is signed.
issues.health: Secure a publicly owned NHS, free at point of use. Provide Fairer Pensions and free Social Care for older people.
issues.socialWelfare: Provide Fairer Pensions and free Social Care for older people.

housing.content: Decent Social Housing & Affordable Homes to meet local people's needs.

images.caption: Blandford Car Club, Dorset Flexicars CTC

leaflet.additionalNotes: HERE IN NORTH DORSET WE WILL ALSO WORK FOR: Participatory Democracy, transparency & ethical investment by Councils. Sustainable local businesses. A fair Living Wage for all, an end to Zero Hours Contracts. Improved Public Transport, investment in Renewables & associated jobs. Decent Social Housing & Affordable Homes to meet local people's needs. The rights of local farmers against the threat of cheap, less regulated US imports if the Trans-Atlantic Trade & Investment Partnership (TTIP) is signed.
